title: Undead Warrior Vocalizations
description: A collection of undead warrior vocalizations, contains 225 sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/undead-warrior-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/rtua7fovkyq29if/MSE%20-%20Undead%20Warrior%20Vocalizations_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The Undead Warrior is a strong, agile and large-sized fighter. In a past life he was a Viking, but black magic brought him back from the world of the dead for one purpose - to send his enemies into this world.


The collection contains 13 voice actions, including 225 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 25 attacks
  • 25 battle shouts
  • 25 deaths
  • 5 exerts and efforts
  • 5 exhaling sounds
  • 10 groans
  • 25 growls
  • 10 jumps ans actions
  • 10 laughs
  • 30 pains
  • 30 roars
  • 10 snarling sounds
  • 15 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.


This package is ideal for creating large monster and boss voices: warrior, viking, titan, giant, dark knight, guardian, elemental, infernal and undead creatures and more.Â 


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 225 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 13 voice actions
  • 130 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 65 voice samples of the pain type
  • 30 neutral type voice samples
  • great for game scenes, animations and trailers


Number of Audio Waves: 225

Number of Audio Cues: 225

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 08 minutes 06 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
